respStmt.name: Tom Elliott
David M. Ratzan
Patrick J. Burns

publicationStmt.ab: Drafting working materials by Institute for the Study of the Ancient World. Not ready for publication.

sourceDesc.bibl: R.S. Bagnall, R. Casagrande-Kim, A. Ersoy, C. Tanriver and B. Yolaçan, Graffiti from the Basilica in the Agora of Smyrna (New York 2016), T28.1..

msIdentifier.geogName: Basilica of the Agora of Smyrna

supportDesc.support:
about 1.50 m above ground level and 10 cm from the left edge of the bay. area ca 40 cm wide
× 30 cm high, in box. detached capital letters 4–5 cm high. Bibliography: Bagnall, Everyday Writing, p. 19; SEG 61.964.

div.ab:
ζήτημα Εἴσιδι αδι αδι διασω
θείς αδι α-
δ[ι’] <Ἰσ>ίδωρ̣ος̣
traces ΕΝ
ΑΜ ̣ ̣ ̣ ̣ ̣ ΠΕΙΠ ̣ ̣
“riddle: to Isis (adi adi), having been saved (adi adi), Isidoros . . .”
ca. 1.0 m from the left, ca. 1.05 m from the ground. width uncertain, height ca. 3 cm. small letters of minuscule style but largely detached, 1 cm high.
